description: The module aims to provide students with the fundamentals of financial market systematic trading. It covers the difference between discretionary and systematic systems, and the advantages and the need for systematic systems. The module will emphasize the design and development of both the trading strategies and the trading systems with the help of technical analysis and programming languages. It will focus on rule-based systematic trading, both manual and through algorithms. It will also cover investor biases and how to overcome those biases through data and systems to make better trading decisions and to have proper risk management.
title: Systematic Trading Strategies and Systems
